creator: Infielight
descriptionHtml:
Micro Habits:
This app helps you manage your daily habits.

Micro habits help you make the most of your task management. Whether you want to break bad habits, create a good habit list, set task reminders, or even create a daily to-do list, achieve your goals with micro habits. Our goal is to build a simple habit tracker. "Micro habits" is your ideal habit tracker app. A "micro habits" is not only a habit tracker; it’s an attitude, a commitment, a planner, a list and an achiever. Join "micro habits" now and receive a marvellous new self. Who knows the potential?

My Diary Journal, Diary, and Daily Journal
security of your memories and private journals. Sync your diary journal to ensure security and keep diaries accessible on different devices.

Beautiful Interface
Interface that is beautiful, minimalistic, and lightweightLoop has an elegant and minimalistic interface that is very easy to use, even for first-time users. Highly optimised for speed, the app works well even on older phones.And seeing other people working on their goals can motivate you to work on yours.
 

Reminders
Schedule notifications to remind you of your habits. Each habit can have its own reminder, at a chosen time of the day. Easily check or dismiss your habit directly from the notification.
Add Some Positive Habits.
Want to go for a nice walk every day? Or maybe give 3 hugs every Saturday and Sunday? Join us on this journey!

Cut Bad Habits From Your Life
Simply start tracking bad habits like nail biting, smoking, or drinking too much. Once you see the patterns, it's easier to break them. Micro habits keeps you accountable. It's also great for users of NoFap!

Who is it for?
Whether you want to read some more, stop smoking, start working out or even just track how many hours you wasted on Facebook, micro habits lets you do it!
descriptionShort: Divide goals into small habits to reach goals faster and easier.

Our goal is to build a simple habit tracking app. A "micro habit" contains the best tools and technique to build and stick to your habits, and achieve your goals


Create goal:
Every goal can be divided into small micro-habit and doing those micro-habit daily is easier and ones your micro habit become part of life you can achieve any goal easily.

Accountability partner:
Add an accountability partner, which can track your progress and keep you on track of your goals. Your accountability partner can
notify you about specific goals to complete or acknowledge your progress. Keeping an accountability partner can greatly increase the possibility of you keep doing your habits daily and achieve your goals.

Habit stacking:
Habit stacking is a technique where you combine your new habit with your existing routine or habits. Habit stacking is a good way to start a new and hard habit after doing your usual routine, or integrate your new habit with an existing routine. You can easily create and manage habit stacks with Micro habits.

Journaling :
writing a daily journal is one of the most import habit that you can integrate to get more clearly of your day,
it helps you make daily design which can help you to stick your habits and make you appreciate your day.

Journal template:
morning and night journal template to construct your journals.
Sync your diary journal to ensure security and keep diaries accessible on different devices.

Beautiful interface:
That is beautiful, minimalistic, and lightweight. Micro habits have an elegant and minimalistic interface that is very easy to use, even for first-time users. Highly optimized for speed, the app works well even on older phones.

Reminders: Schedule
notifications to remind you of your habits. Each habit can have its own reminder at a chosen time of day.

Hourly notification:
Hourly notification help you to get back from distraction every hour.

Inspiration :
This app is inspired by the book "Atomic Habit," which has many techniques that I tried to use in my daily life but failed, so I created this app. Thank you, James Clear, for writing such a wonderful book.

How can this app help you?
Micro habits allow you to do things like to build new habits efficiently and stick to them for long term.
And with an accountability partner, you and your partner can help each other to achieve your goal.

it helps you make daily design which can help you to stick your habits and make you appreciate your day.

Journal template:
morning and night journal template to construct your journals.
Sync your diary journal to ensure security and keep diaries accessible on different devices.

Timer:
Start a timer for every habit you have. You can select time for every habit.

Beautiful interface:
That is beautiful, minimalistic, and lightweight. Micro habits have an elegant and minimalistic interface that is very easy to use, even for first-time users. Highly optimized for speed, the app works well even on older phones.

Reminders: Schedule
notifications to remind you of your habits. Each habit can have its own reminder at a chosen time of day.

Hourly notification:
Hourly notification help you to get back from distraction every hour.

Inspiration :
This app is inspired by the book “Atomic Habit” which has many techniques that I tried to use in my daily life but failed, so I created this app. Thank you, James Clear, for writing such a wonderful book.

How can this app help you?
Micro habits allow you to do things like to build new habits efficiently and stick to them for long term.
And with an accountability partner, you and your partner can help each other to achieve your goal.
descriptionShort: Divide goals into small habits to reach goal faster, with accountability partner

title: Micro Habits - habit tracker

creator: Infielight
descriptionHtml:
self-improvement, habit tracker, goal tracker, routine tracker, journaling, accountability partners.

Microhabits
Breaking down your goal into small, manageable habits and practising those habits on a daily basis will help you achieve your goal.

Habit tracker:
Add good habits to your daily life. Make it a habit of tracking your progress every day. You can set reminders for every habit and set a time.

Goal tracker:
Every goal can be divided into small habits, and doing those habits daily is easier, and once your habits become part of your life, you can easily achieve your goals.

Accountability partner:
Add an accountability partner, who can track your progress and keep you on track with your goals. Your accountability partner can notify you about specific goals to complete or acknowledge your progress. Having an accountability partner can greatly increase the possibility of you keeping your habits daily and achieving your goals.

routine tracker:
A habit routine is a technique where you combine your new habit with your existing routine. Daily routines are a good way to start a new and hard habit after doing your usual routine or integrating your new habit with an existing routine.

The weekly habit challenge:
Every week we have a new weekly challenge which you can do. Weekly challenges are mostly for self-improvement. You can suggest a new weekly challenge as well.

Journaling:
Writing a daily journal is one of the most important habits that you can integrate into your life to get a clearer view of your day and appreciate your day.

streaks:
You can build streaks of goals and routine and collect points by sticking to your habits.

Timer:
Start a timer for every habit you have. You can select a time for every habit. 

Our goal:
Our goal is to build a simple habit tracking app. A "micro habit" contains the best tools and techniques to build and stick to your habits, goals, and routine and achieve your goals.

beautiful interface
That is beautiful, minimalistic, and lightweight. Microhabit has an elegant and minimalistic interface that is very easy to use, even for first-time users.

Reminders:
Schedule reminders to remind you of your habits, goals, and journaling. Each habit and routine can have their own reminder at a chosen time of day.

Hourly Reminder:
The Hourly Reminder helps you to get back from distraction every hour.

Statistics
beautiful statistics and visualisation of your habits, routines, journaling and goals.

How can this app help you?
Micro habits allow you to do things like build new habits, goals, routines, and journaling efficiently and stick to them for the long term. And with an accountability partner, you and your partner can help each other to achieve your goal.
descriptionShort: Habit tracker, goal tracker, routines, journaling, with accountability partner

title: Micro Habits: Self-Improvement

creator: Infielight
descriptionHtml:
Self-improvement:
Micro habits have all the tools which will help you in your self-improvement journey. like Habit tracker, goal tracker, to-do, routine tracker, mood tracker, journaling, accountability partners.

Habit tracker:
Add good habits to your daily life. Make it a habit of tracking your progress every day. You can set reminders for every habit and set a time. Track habits, get reminders, start timer, and see the daily, monthly stats.

Accountability partner:
Add an accountability partner, who can track your progress and keep you on track with your goals. Your accountability partner can notify you about specific goals to complete or acknowledge your progress. Having an accountability partner can greatly increase the possibility of you keeping your habits daily and achieving your goals.

Todo:
Create a to-do list with notification and priority to be productive throughout the day.

Routine tracker:
A habit routine is a technique where you combine your new habit with your existing routine. Daily routines are a good way to start a new and hard habit after doing your usual routine or integrating your new habit with an existing routine.

Mood Tracker:
Track your mood throughout the day, with a note.

The weekly habit challenge:
Every week we have a new weekly challenge which you can do. Weekly challenges are mostly for self-improvement. It is a new habit which you can do and track. You can suggest a new weekly challenge as well.

personal weekly and monthly challenges:

You can set your own weekly and monthly challenges.
Journaling:
Writing a daily journal is one of the most important habits that you can integrate into your life to get a clearer view of your day and appreciate your day.

Streaks:
You can build streaks of goals and routine and collect points by sticking to your habits.

Timer:
Start a timer for every habit you have. You can select a time for every habit. 

Our goal:
Our goal is to build a simple habit tracking app. A "micro habit" contains the best tools and techniques to build and stick to your habits, goals, and routine and achieve your goals.

Beautiful interface:
That is beautiful, minimalistic, and lightweight. Microhabit has an elegant and minimalistic interface that is very easy to use, even for first-time users.

Reminders:
Schedule reminders to remind you of your habits, goals, and journaling. Each habit and routine can have their own reminder at a chosen time of day.

Hourly Reminder:
The Hourly Reminder helps you to get back from distraction every hour.

Statistics
beautiful statistics and visualization of your habits, routines, journaling and goals.

How can this app help you?
Micro habits allow you to do things like to build new habits, goals, routines, mood tracker and journaling efficiently and stick to them for the long term. And with an accountability partner, you and your partner can help each other to achieve your goal.

title: Micro Habits: Self-Improvement

creator: Infielight
descriptionHtml:
Self-Improvement Made Easy:
Embark on a transformative journey with Micro Habits, the ultimate app for self-improvement. Discover a comprehensive toolkit featuring habit tracking, goal management, to-do lists, routine tracking, mood monitoring, journaling, and accountability partnerships.

Track Your Habits:
Develop positive habits and monitor your progress effortlessly. Set reminders and timers, view daily and monthly statistics, and stay motivated to reach your goals.

Stay Accountable:
Unlock your full potential with an accountability partner who keeps you on track. Receive notifications, track goals, and celebrate milestones together. Achieve greatness through mutual support and encouragement.

Boost Productivity with To-Do Lists:
Stay organized and productive throughout the day with our intuitive to-do list. Set notifications and prioritize tasks to make the most of your time.

Master Your Routines:
Integrate new habits seamlessly into your existing routines. Start your day right by aligning your new habits with your daily activities. Experience the power of consistent practice.

Track Your Mood:
Stay in touch with your emotions by recording your mood throughout the day. Add personal notes to gain valuable insights into your well-being.

Weekly Habit Challenges:
Embrace exciting weekly challenges designed to push your boundaries and promote self-improvement. Join the community in pursuing new habits and share your own challenge ideas.

Customize Your Challenges:
Tailor your own weekly and monthly challenges to suit your unique aspirations. Set ambitious targets and chart your progress towards personal growth.

Unlock the Power of Journaling:
Cultivate the habit of daily journaling to gain clarity and appreciation for each day. Reflect, record, and find inspiration in the power of self-expression.

Celebrate Streaks and Earn Points:
Build impressive streaks for your goals and routines. Collect points and stay motivated by maintaining consistent habits.

Set Timers for Success:
Activate timers for each habit to manage your time effectively. Define specific durations for maximum productivity.

Our Mission:
At Micro Habits, our mission is to provide a simple yet powerful habit tracking app. We empower you to build, maintain, and achieve your goals, habits, and routines.

Sleek and Intuitive Design:
Experience a beautiful, minimalistic, and user-friendly interface. Micro Habits offers an elegant design that seamlessly guides you towards self-improvement.

Stay Reminded:
Never miss a beat with customizable reminders for habits, goals, and journaling. Set reminders for each individual habit and routine at your preferred time of day.

Hourly Reminder:
Combat distractions and regain focus with our hourly reminder feature. Stay on track and make every hour count.

Visualize Your Progress:
Gain valuable insights through stunning statistics and visualizations. Monitor your habits, routines, journaling, and goals with clarity and precision.

How Can Micro Habits Help You?
Micro Habits empowers you to effortlessly build and maintain new habits, achieve your goals, stick to routines, track your mood, and enhance your journaling experience. With the support of an accountability partner, you can elevate your growth to new heights."

Discover the power of Micro Habits and unlock your full potential. Download the app today and embark on your journey of self-improvement!
descriptionShort: self-improvement, Habit, Routine, Mood tracker with accountability partner.
